title: Hammerer
fluff: The most skilled warriors in a Dwarfholds are the Axedwarves.

reward.name: Mountain Fortress.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of The Grudgebreaker an axedwarf may establish or build a Mountain Fortress. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve the axedwarf. These followers are completely devoted to the axedwarf, never checking morale.
